What We Do

“They exhibit the core standard for customer service and I wish that every companies did the same”

– Marie Switzer

What We Do

Simple. We make it easy for a wide range of small and medium sized merchants to take payments cost effectively. That’s what we do.

\xA0

Face to Face Payments

Of course we enable credit card and debit card payments at the point of sale or over the phone.\xA0 In addition to point of sale, we provide ecommerce, mobile and international payment processing, all from a single, intuitive user interface.

Click here

e-Commerce

PayLeap gives you the option to process e-commerce payments with your single PayLeap account. You can payments enable your web site with a simple link to our hosted page. Or you can use our APIs and SDKs for a completely customized payments module.

Click here

Mobile Payments

Shoppers are moving to mobile commerce and they are not waiting for merchants to adapt. PayLeap’s hosted LeapLock web page automatically optimizes for any device. For merchants with their own apps, the PayLeap API makes integration to PayLeap easy for developers.

Click here

Phone Orders

Mail and phone payments are a way of life for many businesses such as florists and catalogs. PayLeap provides a virtual terminal to make it no problem to ensure quick entry of orders and simple card acceptance. With PayLeap’s Customer Vault, customer history is at your fingertips.

Click here

PaySecure\xAE\xA0Internet PIN Debit

Only PayLeap offers your customers the option to pay on their mobile device or your website using their debit card and PIN. Consumers love paying with their PIN—in fact it is the most used form of electronic payment. And only PayLeap offers PaySecure\xAE\xA0internet PIN debit through the online PIN pad.

Click here

Extras

Merchants get an extra boost beyond the standard payments processing with PayLeap’s Growth Advantage Tools. Productivity enhancing tools like Recurring Billing and Social Media Marketing that expand your reach. PayLeap adds in the extras with your account and it doesn’t cost you anything more.

Click here
Facebook Twitter Envelope Plus-square
See a Live Demo Now!

Start Processing
Payments Today!

What We Do

“They exhibit the core standard for customer service and I wish that every companies did the same”

– Marie Switzer

What We Do

Simple. We make it easy for a wide range of small and medium sized merchants to take payments cost effectively. That’s what we do.

 

Face to Face Payments

Of course we enable credit card and debit card payments at the point of sale or over the phone.  In addition to point of sale, we provide ecommerce, mobile and international payment processing, all from a single, intuitive user interface.

Click here

e-Commerce

PayLeap gives you the option to process e-commerce payments with your single PayLeap account. You can payments enable your web site with a simple link to our hosted page. Or you can use our APIs and SDKs for a completely customized payments module.

Click here

Mobile Payments

Shoppers are moving to mobile commerce and they are not waiting for merchants to adapt. PayLeap’s hosted LeapLock web page automatically optimizes for any device. For merchants with their own apps, the PayLeap API makes integration to PayLeap easy for developers.

Click here

Phone Orders

Mail and phone payments are a way of life for many businesses such as florists and catalogs. PayLeap provides a virtual terminal to make it no problem to ensure quick entry of orders and simple card acceptance. With PayLeap’s Customer Vault, customer history is at your fingertips.

Click here

PaySecure® Internet PIN Debit

Only PayLeap offers your customers the option to pay on their mobile device or your website using their debit card and PIN. Consumers love paying with their PIN—in fact it is the most used form of electronic payment. And only PayLeap offers PaySecure® internet PIN debit through the online PIN pad.

Click here

Extras

Merchants get an extra boost beyond the standard payments processing with PayLeap’s Growth Advantage Tools. Productivity enhancing tools like Recurring Billing and Social Media Marketing that expand your reach. PayLeap adds in the extras with your account and it doesn’t cost you anything more.

Click here

See a Live Demo Now!

Payments Today!
